law.catch_line: Organizational units of Department of Corrections.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 72, sec. 1, effective June 25, 2013. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 222, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 71, sec. 10, effective June 24, 2003. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 60, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 217, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 227, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1994.
